# Serene Landscaping - Edmonton
# Professional landscaping, lawn care, hardscaping, and snow removal

> Landscape Design: https://serenelandscapes.ca/services/landscape-design/
Professional landscape design and installation for residential and commercial properties in Edmonton, St. Albert, Spruce Grove, and Sherwood Park.

> Hardscaping: https://serenelandscapes.ca/services/hardscaping/
Interlocking paver patios, walkways, retaining walls, and outdoor living spaces built for Edmonton winters.

> Lawn Maintenance: https://serenelandscapes.ca/services/lawn-maintenance/
Weekly and bi-weekly lawn care, mowing, edging, spring and fall cleanups for Edmonton properties.

> Final Grading: https://serenelandscapes.ca/services/final-grading/
Final grading and topsoil preparation for new construction and landscaping projects.

> Snow Removal: https://serenelandscapes.ca/services/snow-removal/
24/7 commercial snow removal and residential snow clearing services throughout winter.

> Fences: https://serenelandscapes.ca/services/fences/
Cedar and vinyl fence installation, gates, and fence repair services for residential and commercial properties.

> Artificial Grass: https://serenelandscapes.ca/services/artificial-grass/
Low-maintenance synthetic turf installation for backyards, patios, balconies, putting greens, playgrounds, and pet runs. Year-round green lawns without mowing or watering.

# Service Areas
Edmonton, St. Albert, Spruce Grove, Sherwood Park, Fort Saskatchewan, Leduc, Beaumont, Stony Plain, Devon, Morinville

# Contact
